arts.ttl: Confused Luton fail to lay a glove on Blades during timid defeat
Sheffield United 2-0 Luton Town: The Blades go marching on
arts.sum: Sheffield United kept yet another clean sheet, whilst recording a fourth home victory of the season, against Luton Town. Two goals from Jesurun Rak-Sakyi, early on in either half, was enough to give the Blades all three points against Luton, and now United sit 2nd, level on points with Sunderland.
